name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SoldCount - Show eBay Best Offer Prices

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Would you like to know the Official winning Bid/Price on the recently Sold Ebay Listings? Using this Extension you can find theâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Would you like to know the Official winning Bid/Price on the recently Sold Ebay Listings? Using this Extension you can find the actual prices of the completed sold listings on ebay. It also provides additional data and information to help you figure out the best price for the item your thinking of buying or selling on ebay. Find the highest purchased prices and the lowest Purchased price on the top of your search results.

The Extension will provide a easy to view scatter plot that displays all the prices with the dates to help give you a better understanding of the range in which the most sold price is. 
To request additional features please contact us at team@cardprice.com 
To view and save your collection of Trading cards/ Sports cards, check out cardprice.com
